org.hkijena.acaq5.api.data.traits

Annotation Type ConfigTraits


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ConfigTraits
    Configures the behavior of a standard ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration that is generated by ACAQAlgorithm

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean allowModify
      If true, users can add custom traits
      boolean autoTransfer
      If true, traits are automatically transferred the following way: The union set of input data traits is transferred to all output data slots.

    • Element Detail

      • autoTransfer

        public abstract boolean autoTransfer
        If true, traits are automatically transferred the following way: The union set of input data traits is transferred to all output data slots.
        Returns:
        enable auto-transfer
        Default:
        true

      • allowModify

        public abstract boolean allowModify
        If true, users can add custom traits
        Returns:
        allow user modification
        Default:
        false
